sentences.english: Seed development in most instances commences following fertilization of the ovule.
sentences.chinese: 大多数种子的形成是从胚珠受精开始的。

sentences.english: During ovule culture sucrose at 5% and 8% was optimum.
sentences.chinese: 胚珠培养期间的蔗糖浓度以5%和8%为宜。

sentences.english: The ovule browning of Zaocuiwang could be efficiently prevented by removing integument during inoculation.
sentences.chinese: 取出早脆王胚珠，剥去珠被接种可以有效防止褐化。

sentences.english: The primary chalazal haustorium ramifies around the vascular tissues of the ovule .
sentences.chinese: 初生合点吸器沿着胚珠的维管组织分支。

sentences.english: This paper reviews the progress made in the investigation of ovule development.
sentences.chinese: 本文对拟南芥胚珠发育的分子调控机制进行了综述。

sentences.english: The signal system established by WUS is also involved in ovule development.
sentences.chinese: 由WUS建立的信号体系还参与胚珠的发育。

sentences.english: Ovule primordia occur from placenta in mid November.
sentences.chinese: 十一月中旬时胚珠原体凸出胎座表面。

sentences.english: Nutrients pass through the funicle to the ovule and seed.
sentences.chinese: 营养物质通过珠柄传递到胚珠和种子。

sentences.english: Ovules attached to the walls of the ovary.
Pollen is usually blown to other trees and fertilizes their ovules.
sentences.chinese: 花粉经常会被风吹到其他树上，使它们的胚珠受精。

sentences.english: Ovarian 2 rooms, ovule much line, style filiform, post tongue shape is compressed.
sentences.chinese: 子房2室，胚珠多列，花柱丝状，柱头舌状扁平。

sentences.english: Fruit The ripened OVARY of a flower that is usually formed following fertilization of the ovule.
sentences.chinese: 显花植物的成熟子房，通常是胚珠受精后形成。

sentences.english: This paper reported the first results of ovule culture in beet wide hybridization.
sentences.chinese: 本文首次报告了甜菜远缘杂交胚珠培养的结果。

sentences.english: The ovules of early-ripening seedless grape 'Youngle' can be fertilized normally.
sentences.chinese: 早熟无核葡萄杨格尔的胚珠可正常受精。

sentences.english: Ovules attached to the central axis of an ovary with two or more locules.
sentences.chinese: 胚珠着生在二室或多室子房的中轴上。

sentences.english: The vascular bundle of ovule of Phytolacca is evidently from the vascular tissue of receptacle.
sentences.chinese: 商陆属植物的胚珠维管束明显地来自花托的维管组织。
